channel.title: Please help it's urgent
channel.description: OK so i want to give my server out to people. Ive worked on it for some time now following guides and coding ect, the only thing idk how to do is how to put all my files into a folder and send it to someone and to let them connect to my server through the client files. Please send me a message on how to do so please and thanks. No trolling if so gtfo , thanks ! ^_^

item.title: Please help it's urgent
item.dc:creator: @poken poken
item.description:
@poken wrote:

ok in your client folder chec for gui file that in java…chec for (127.0.0.1) that mean only u can play change it to your ip
go on whatsmyip.com for find your ip
and afhther you are juste need to zip your file whit your ip and send it to your friend but for your own cmp set you gui to
127.0.0.1 back

XD
if you could chec my post to i need help whit one think maybe some 1 cuold help me XD

item.title: Please help it's urgent
item.dc:creator: @wolfisproz wolfisproz
item.description:
@wolfisproz wrote:

No like my friend wants my client and i give him my gfiles and everything and when he clicks the run.bat for the client it goes and then automatically diseapears and it doesnt open. idk what to do

item.title: Please help it's urgent
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

go into your client folder, but first make a new folder on what you want your client name to be. etc mines “TT Scape Client”. copy everything from your client folder only! and paste into your other client folder. right click then add to archive. and upload to sites and spread the word!

Read full topic
